description: This CSS file manages themes including styles for light and dark modes, as well as the layout and styling for the main application components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application with text alignment and background color management.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo with dimensions and animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component of the application, styled with background color and flexbox for layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the application with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with styles for position, background color, and interactions.
